titleStmt.title: Lanii triumphantes, or, The butchers prize being a description of the famous battel between Achilles a butcher of Greece and Hector a weaver of Troy, occasion'd by the rape of a daughty damosill y-clep'd Hellen the bright.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.B. for William Crook,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
